Title: entropy
Description: Calculates Shannon entropy of a column of values.
val — Column of values of any type.
Examples: CREATE TABLE entropy (`vals` UInt32,`strings` String) ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO entropy VALUES (1, 'A'), (1, 'A'), (1,'A'), (1,'A'), (2,'B'), (2,'B'), (2,'C'), (2,'D');SELECT entropy(vals), entropy(strings) FROM entropy;
